type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Modify Dragon Fireball

---



[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/modify_dragon_fireball).

Can modify certain values of any dragon fireball the player uses, whether this be through the item form or the Dragonborn origin.

Type ID: `toomanyorigins:modify_dragon_fireball`



---
type.markdownDescription:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Modify Dragon Fireball

---



[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/modify_dragon_fireball).

Can modify certain values of any dragon fireball the player uses, whether this be through the item form or the Dragonborn origin.

Type ID: `toomanyorigins:modify_dragon_fireball`



---

damage_modifier.description: If set, this modifier will apply to the damage amount.
damage_modifier.markdownDescription: If set, this modifier will apply to the damage amount.

damage_modifiers.description: If set, these modifiers will apply to the damage amount.
damage_modifiers.markdownDescription: If set, these modifiers will apply to the damage amount.

min_radius.description: Sets the radius to the amount of blocks specified at the start of the AoE's life.
min_radius.markdownDescription: Sets the radius to the amount of blocks specified at the start of the AoE's life.

max_radius.description: Sets the radius to the amount of blocks specified at the end of the AoE's life.
max_radius.markdownDescription: Sets the radius to the amount of blocks specified at the end of the AoE's life.

duration.description: Specifies the duration that the AoE Entity is out for.
duration.markdownDescription: Specifies the duration that the AoE Entity is out for.
